reviews.comment: Soundbox device keeps freezing during payment transactions, customers getting frustrated and leaving
Payment gateway timeout errors happening multiple times per day, losing business
Transaction fees deducted twice for same payment, need immediate refund
Refund process taking 15+ days, affecting my cash flow severely
UPI payments failing randomly, customers complaining about payment experience
Excellent payment processing speed, customers love the quick transactions
Seamless integration with my POS system, very satisfied with performance
Perfect payment solution for my business, highly recommend to other merchants
Outstanding customer service team, resolved my issues quickly
Reliable payment processing, no issues in past 3 months
Soundbox display screen is too small, can't read transaction details clearly
Button layout is confusing, customers press wrong buttons frequently
Voice prompts are unclear and too fast, elderly customers struggle
Need better visual feedback when payment is processing, customers get confused
Screen brightness too low in daylight, can't see anything outdoors
Love the new interface update, much more user-friendly now
Outstanding design improvements, customers find it very easy to use
Great visual design and intuitive button placement, very satisfied
Clean interface design, customers appreciate the simplicity
Excellent user experience, even first-time users understand it quickly
Soundbox firmware crashes during software updates, device becomes unusable
Device overheating issues causing automatic shutdowns during busy periods
Network connectivity drops frequently, losing transaction data
Soundbox takes 30+ seconds to boot up, customers walk away
Hardware failure - buttons stopped working after 2 months
Speaker volume too low, customers can't hear payment confirmations
Battery drains too quickly, need to charge multiple times daily
WiFi connection unstable, affecting payment processing reliability
Latest firmware update fixed all connectivity issues, working perfectly
Excellent hardware reliability and performance after recent updates
The interface is confusing and hard to navigate, buttons are too small and poorly labeled
Menu layout is terrible, can't find basic settings easily, very frustrating user experience
Screen text is too small to read, need better font size options for older users
Color scheme is awful, can't distinguish between different buttons and options
App crashes when trying to access transaction history, interface needs major redesign
Touch response is poor, have to tap multiple times to select options, very annoying
No clear visual feedback when buttons are pressed, customers get confused
Loading screens take forever with no progress indicator, users think device is frozen
Error messages are cryptic and unhelpful, need user-friendly explanations
Icons are unclear and don't match their functions, customers keep pressing wrong buttons
